name: The Miner's Curse (UGJ 2020)
description:
A miner goes deep within the dungeons of an old mine in search of gems and riches only to be cursed with wandering around in circles. Better find those gems fast!

A United Game Jam submission, The Miner's Curse uses the jam theme of TWO within it's simplistic two button controls to navigate the dungeons and escape the evil curse!

Robert Contreras - Art, Sound, Design
Chris Jaroszko - Programming, Design
